channel.title: [508 DavidScape] Portals in spawn and motd
channel.description: Hey! On my server I have som portals in my spawn, which I don't want. And I have some messages (appears in a box similar to a quest/skillguide box) on my screen when I log in. I also need to need to make my motd different. Can anyone help me with these things? I have watched and read tutorials but haven't found anything that works with my server (my server files is different from theirs). I have skype if anyone wants to help me there

item.title: [508 DavidScape] Portals in spawn and motd
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Xsef:

Yeah I have tried searching but the problem is that it can’t find anything. Example: I search for davidscape and it get 0 results. It can only find standalone words and not words with other letters/numbers right besides it. I will have to go in manually and search every document with notepad. At least notepad finds words…

Why not just use grep, or findstr?

Read full topic

item.title: [508 DavidScape] Portals in spawn and motd

item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Yea, use an IDE. I honestly can’t remember where the MOTD is.

item.source: [508 DavidScape] Portals in spawn and motd

item.title: [508 DavidScape] Portals in spawn and motd
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Xsef:

Yeah I have tried searching but the problem is that it can’t find anything. Example: I search for davidscape and it get 0 results. It can only find standalone words and not words with other letters/numbers right besides it. I will have to go in manually and search every document with notepad. At least notepad finds words…

Are you using Windows 7? Windows 7 can search java files with no problems. I can search for “1234” and it’d pull up files that had the string “1234567890”.
Another way to do the search is to get the Z-FileSearcher.jar. It does basically the same thing, though I’m not a fan of the UI.
A third option is to load up the project in an IDE and use the IDE’s file search. This is something I would highly recommend.

Read full topic
item.source: [508 DavidScape] Portals in spawn and motd

item.title: [508 DavidScape] Portals in spawn and motd
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Have you tried using windows file search to just search the plain text and then editing/removing it?

As for the portals: get their object ids. Then search them using the file search. Delete the code that looks like it’s related to spawning them.

Note: I don’t use a 508 source nor DavidScape.

Read full topic
